Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! This unique and intricate antique finish silver-tone pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addition to anyone's timepiece collection. Features include a detailed coin edged intricate double cover etched design depicting a classic steam engine locomotive train, precision 17 jewel mechanical movement showcased in full view thru front and back scratch resistant mineral crystals, rich white outer dial with Roman numerals plus elegant blue cobalt hands. In addition, this beautiful railroad timepiece includes a matching antique silver-tone 14 inch curb chain with deluxe lobster claw clasp. As always, your pocket watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy. - Antique silver-tone pocket watch with steam engine locomotive train cover design - Double cover design that opens to expose elegant 17 jewel mechanical movement - Scratch resistant front and back mineral crystals plus white outer dial with black Roman numerals - Includes matching 14" curb pocket watch chain with lobster claw attachment - Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions Gotham Mens Antique Silver-Tone Double Cover Exhibition Mechanical Pocket Watch
